data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V., Smetana, Aleš (2018): A revision of Eastern Palaearctic Anthobium Leach, 1819 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Anthophagini). II. fusculum group, and two additional species of the nigrum group. Zootaxa 4508 (4): 451-506, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4508.4.1|98 occurrences
